aboutsection_title: Why hire me for your project or company?
aboutsection_description_1: I am a Systems Engineer graduated from the Corporaci√≥n de la Costa with a specialization in automation and industrial process control, and a technological specialization in database administration.
aboutsection_description_2: I consider myself a person with leadership skills, teamwork ability, and adaptability to change. I have a research-oriented, innovative, and creative mindset, along with a high degree of responsibility and commitment. I possess skills to analyze, design, develop, and coordinate technological projects. I am prepared with the will, knowledge, and enthusiasm to meet the challenges presented.
